changeSet.createProcedure:
/* TSQL String Array Workbench 16 March 2008 by Robyn Page and Phil Factor http://www.simple-talk.com/sql/t-sql-programming/tsql-string-array-workbench/
Gets the specified value of an item from an array created by Utility.StringToArray */
CREATE FUNCTION Utility.ArrayItemAt( @TheArray xml, @index int ) RETURNS varchar(max) AS BEGIN return (select element.value('item[1]', 'VARCHAR(max)') FROM @TheArray.nodes('/stringarray/element[position()=sql:variable("@index")]') array(element))
END
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON Utility.ArrayItemAt TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON Utility.ArrayItemAt FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE Utility.ArrayItemAt;
